instruction: "Transition to the right as you come upon the hospital."
"Deviate to the right at the old church."
"Tack to the right past the cinema."
"Veer to the right when you see the gas station."
"Bank right when you see the blue building."
"Make a starboard turn at the stop sign."
"Divert to the right when you reach the pedestrian crossing."
"Twist towards the right as you exit the freeway."
